ECL Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 280 ITI Apprentice Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 18, 2025, 11:56 IST
 Eastern Coalfields Limited
 280 Jobs |  Posted On : 18-Aug-2025 |  West Bengal |  Salary : 7,000 to 7,700




FOLLOW

The Eastern Coalfields Limited (ECL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 280 ITI Apprentice Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their ITI can apply for the ECL Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in West Bengal.

ECL Recruitment 2025 Eligiblity Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
ITI Apprentice	280	ITI

ECL Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 35 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

ECL Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the

Merit List.
Document Verification.

ECL Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

ECL Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 7,000/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 7,700/- per month.
How to Apply for the ECL Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the ECL Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligiblity criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form to the mentioned address.
Take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Address:

 Office of the General Manager, HRD, Dishergarh, Paschim Burdwan, WB-713333.

Important Dates:

Starting date	13-08-2025
Closing date	26-09-2025

 

Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here
